3.10.0.0.message: **ai-proxy-advanced**: Added new `priority` balancer algorithm, which allows setting apriority group for each upstream model.
**ai-proxy-advanced**: Added the `failover_criteria` configuration option, which allows retrying requests to the next upstream server in case of failure.
**AI Proxy Advanced**: Added cost to `tokens_count_strategy` when using the lowest-usage load balancing strategy.
**AI Proxy Advanced**: Added the ability to set a catch-all target in semantic routing.
**ai-proxy-advanced**: Fixed an issue where the ai-proxy-advanced plugin failed to failover between providers of different formats.
**ai-proxy-advanced**: Fixed an issue where the ai-proxy-advanced plugin identity running failed in retry scenarios.

3.9.0.0.message: **ai-proxy-advanced**: Added support for streaming responses to the AI Proxy Advanced plugin.

**ai-semantic-cache**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**, **ai-proxy-advanced**: Made the
`embeddings.model.name` config field a free text entry, enabling use of a
self-hosted (or otherwise compatible) model.
**ai-proxy-advanced**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.
**ai-proxy-advanced**: Fixed an issue where lowest-usage and lowest-latency strategy did not update data points correctly.

3.8.1.0.message: **ai-proxy-advanced**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.
**ai-proxy-advanced**: Fixed an issue where lowest-usage and lowest-latency strategy did not update data points correctly.

3.8.0.0.message: **ai-proxy-advanced**: Added the `ai-proxy-advanced` plugin that supports advanced load balancing between LLM services.
